Solution for the blind:
1. ONLY FOR MODDED SYSTEMS USING VERBATIM (OR BETTER) DUAL LAYER DISCS.

2. DOWNLOAD http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5133040/Xbox360-activate-iso

3. DOWNLOAD http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4726150/Cookies_Game_Burner_V3

4. INSTALL GAME BURNER, LOAD ACTIVATE.ISO, CHANGE BOOK TYPE FOR DL MEDIA TO DVD-ROM.

5. **CRITICAL** YOU MUST BURN ACTIVATE.ISO AT 4X SPEED (took less than a minute for me to burn) AND YOU MUST CLICK YES ON ALL THE PROMPTS, BURN IT ALL ON 1 LAYER!

6. POP IN ACTIVATE.ISO, RUN IT, AT THE WHITE SCREEN EJECT AND INSERT THE GAME. THE GAME SHOULD LOAD.

7. GOOD LUCK!

@sam19844

region free and PAL/NTSC arent the same thing
you can still have RF that wont play on PAL/NTSC
its rare but happens, specifically theres
3 regions for NTSC and 4 regions of PAL.
RF.NTSC would boot on japan and USA machines for example, but nothing PAL "aussie, euro"
where as a normal NTSC US region would not boot NTSC from japan.
